part_01.cn:
这是一个全新的需求，忽略之前的生成结果。
你是一位电影分镜脚本撰写专家，请根据参考图创作分镜脚本，无需输出过程和注释，仅输出结果。要求：

1. 根据参考图，

simple.en: Generate a simple, single-sentence prompt. Briefly and concisely describe the content and theme involved;
simple.cn: 生成一个简单的单句提示词。简明扼要地描述其中涉及到的内容和主题；

detailed.en: Create a detailed prompt. Integrate the content and themes involved into a coherent paragraph. Highlight key visual details;
detailed.cn: 创作一段详细的提示词。将其中涉及到的内容和主题融合到一个连贯的段落中。重点突出关键的视觉细节；

extreme_detailed.en: Write a rich, extremely detailed, and highly descriptive paragraph that describes in detail the content and themes involved. Strive to create a highly descriptive and immersive prompt;
extreme_detailed.cn: 撰写一段内容丰富、极其详尽且描述性强的段落，详细描述其中涉及到的内容和主题。力求创作出一段极具描述性和沉浸感的提示词；

common.en: The detailed descriptions include the subject, background(scene, season, time, weather, ambient sound<if any>), atmosphere(mood and color tone), action (and voice (if any)), expression, lighting, camera type (shot size and view angle), camera movement, and style.
common.cn: 细节描述包含主体、背景（场景、季节、时间、天气、声音(如果有)）、氛围（气氛及色调）、动作（及话音(如果有)）、表情、灯光、相机类型（景别及视角）、相机运动、风格。

description.en: Place the detailed descriptions into the corresponding areas of a JSON file and output them in <specified_language> language, <shot_detail>; 'motion' refers to the action of the subject, and 'movement' refers to the movement of the camera;
description.cn: 将细节描述放入JSON格式中对应区域并以<特定语种>输出，<shot_detail>；'motion'指主体动作，'movement'指相机运动；

description_global_prefix.en: Add a 'Global' item at the beginning of the JSON format,

description_global.en: get the subject, background(scene, season, time, weather, ambient sound<if any>), atmosphere(mood and color tone), lighting, and style descriptions of all shot scripts, <paragraph_global> and place them in the corresponding area of a JSON file and output them in <specified_language>, <shot_detail_global>;
description_global.cn: 将所有分镜头提示词中的主体、背景（场景、季节、时间、天气、声音(如果有)）、氛围（气氛及色调）、灯光、风格等内容<paragraph_global>放入JSON格式中对应区域并以<特定语种>输出，<shot_detail_global>；

description_shot.en: Get the action (and voice (if any)), expression, lighting, camera type (shot size and view angle), camera movement descriptions, <paragraph_shot> and place them into the corresponding areas of a JSON file and output them in <specified_language> language, <shot_detail_shot>; 'motion' refers to the action of the subject, and 'movement' refers to the movement of the camera; The value cannot be in list format;
description_shot.cn: 将各分镜头提示词中的动作（及话音(如果有)）、表情、相机类型（景别及视角）、相机运动等内容<paragraph_shot>放入JSON格式中对应区域并以<特定语种>输出，<shot_detail_shot>；'motion'指主体动作，'movement'指相机运动；值不能为列表格式；

json_detail.en: Break down the detailed descriptions in the prompt.
json_detail.cn: 将提示词中的细节描述进行拆分。

json_detail.en: Split the detailed descriptions for each all shot prompts,
json_detail.cn: 对所有分镜头提示词进行细节描述的拆分，

no_json_detail.en: Each shot script is the generated <specified_language> language shot prompt;
no_json_detail.cn: 每个镜头的分镜脚本即生成的<特定语种>分镜提示词；

split_shots.en: Create <shot_count> shot scripts based on the story's development; Follow the story and content sequence structure described in it, and ensure that the information hierarchy is clear, the continuity of elements between shots, and the connection of camera framing, perspective and movement;
split_shots.cn: 根据故事发展，创作<shot_count>个分镜头；遵循故事及内容顺序结构，确保信息的层次清晰、前后镜头之间各元素的延续以及相机的景别、视角和运动的衔接；

shot_continuity.en: Descriptions that mean 'the same', 'identical', 'unchanged' or 'still' as the previous description are strictly prohibited. It is also strictly prohibited to use subjects (such as characters), backgrounds (such as scenes) or visual styles that are different from the previous description. Instead, the subjects (such as characters), backgrounds (such as scenes) or visual styles descriptions must be repeated, but appropriate modifications and additions of details are allowed as needed for the storyboard;
shot_continuity.cn: 严禁使用意为与上述“同样”、“同一”、“不变”或“依旧”含义的描述，严禁使用不同的主体（如人物）、背景（如场景）或画面风格，而必须重复使用主体（如人物）、背景（如场景）或画面风格，但允许根据分镜头需要适当修改并添加细节；

combine_shots.en: Combine all shot scripts into a JSON format with keys representing shot numbers(Prefixed with 'shot_').
combine_shots.cn: 将所有分镜头脚本放在按JSON格式代表对应镜头编号的英文名称简写中（以'shot'_为前缀）。

global_prefix.en: Add a 'Global' item at the beginning of the JSON format,

global.en: get the subject, background(scene, season, time, weather, ambient sound<if any>), atmosphere(mood and color tone), lighting, and style of all shot prompts, <paragraph_global> and output in <specified_language>.
global.cn: 将所有分镜头脚本中的主体、背景（场景、季节、时间、天气、声音(如果有)）、氛围（气氛及色调）、灯光、风格等内容<paragraph_global>并按<特定语种>输出。

shot.en: get the action (and voice (if any)), expression, lighting, camera type (shot size and view angle), camera movement of all shot prompts, <paragraph_shot> and output them in <specified_language> for Each shot script;
shot.cn: 将每个分镜脚本中的动作（及话音(如果有)）、表情、相机类型（景别及视角）、相机运动等内容<paragraph_shot>并以<特定语种>输出；

no_story_rule.en: Do not describe subject's internal thoughts or motivations; Do not use hyperbole, metaphor, personification, or other rhetorical devices;
no_story_rule.cn: 不要描述主体的内心想法或动机；不要使用夸张、比喻等修辞手法；

global.en: , write it into a continuous paragraph using natural language,
global.cn: ，使用自然语言编写成一个连续段落，

shot.en: , write it into a continuous paragraph using natural language,
shot.cn: ，使用自然语言编写成一个连续段落，

global.en: , write it into a continuous paragraph using natural language,
global.cn: ，使用自然语言合并编写成一个连续段落，

shot.en: , using time conjunctions (such as 'first', 'then', 'finally'), combine them using natural language according to the sequence of shots, and write them into consecutive paragraphs, the use of shot numbers or timestamps is strictly prohibited,
shot.cn: ，使用时间连接词（例如“首先”、“然后”、“最后”），按分镜头顺序使用自然语言合并，并编写成连续段落，严禁使用镜头编号或时间戳，

first_shot_01.en: And use this prompt as the first shot script;
first_shot_01.cn: 并将这个提示词作为第一个分镜头脚本；
